thread.title: Definitely one of the best on earth
thread.title_full: Definitely one of the best on earth - Review of The St. Regis New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 83yanson
title: Definitely one of the best on earth
text: Absolutely breathless stay. My business turned into a pleasure ! Great tradition of New York hospitality blended with 21st century luxury. Perfect service from arrival to departure, butler T was a magician, restaurant stunning with the best service and well designed a la carte Bar is my favorite and would recommend it even if you are staying somewhere else ! Love it Thank you !
